CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 27, 1954, pg. 9, reads: "Ministers' Wives - Pictured here are a few of the Ministers' Wives of the Allegheny-Union Baptist Association.  This was taken at the dedication ceremonies at the Aged Ministers' and Laymen's Home last Friday when a new television set, given by them. was dedicated.  Seated, left to right: Mmes. B. McMillan, L. Bowick, C. Jackson, S. Morton, president, Women's Auxiliary; W.D. Petett, president, Ministers' Wives; H.H. Gaines, D.B. Russell, widow of late moderator of UBA; M.L. Gordan and Mrs. J.A. Williams, wife of former moderator of the UBA.  in back row are several officers of the parent body: The Revs. J.J. Gaines, H.R. WIlliams, G.F. Nelson and J.F. McMillan.  The other two ministers are the Revs. L. E. Dukes and W. D. Petett, and other wives and friends. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Mrs. H. H. Gaines, Mrs. W. D. Petett, Mrs. S. Morton, unknown woman, Rev. G. F. Nelson, unknown woman, Mrs. J. A. Williams, and Mrs. D. B. Russell, posed around new television set, in Aged Ministers' and Laymen's Home, another version
